pages.text: A very renewable way to generate power is with air currents through a windmill. As long as I am outside in the $(thing)Overworld$(), there's always a surplus of wind energy I can utilize to power my machines.
I need to take care that I don't try to take power from the windmill while it is raining or storming in case one of the $(l:innovation/mechpower/gearbox)gearboxes$() it's connected to will break.
The classical windmill. More power is generated at higher elevations.
A vertical windmill variation. It is possible to use underground but higher elevations generate more power.
This bamboo chime sends out a signal under stormy conditions
